sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '../../services/auth.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'], }) export class RegisterComponent { user = { name: '', tipoDocumento: '', numDocumento: 0, password: '', }; constructor(private authService: AuthService, private router: Router) {} userRegister() { this.authService.userRegister(this.user).subscribe( (res) => { console.log(res); localStorage.setItem('token', res.token); this.router.navigate(['/dashboard']); }, (err) => { console.log(err); } ); } }
